profiles.name: Son Goku
profiles.bio: Yo, I am Goku, I am going to be a lot stronger than I ever was!

profiles.name: Monkey D. Ruffy
profiles.bio: Are we friends? Or are we foes? That kind of thing you decide yourselves!

profiles.name: Naruto Uzumaki
profiles.bio: Hard work is worthless for those that do not believe in themselves.
